short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Watch Movies/Animes/Series Online and Have Fun

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension can be used to watch movies, anime and series online. Find a youtube channel that supports this extension, then click on the "decode" button that will be added in the video controls section. Wait for the video to be decoded and watch.
